sentences.en: A coral reef is built by the accretion of tiny, identical organisms.
sentences.cn: 珊瑚礁是由许多相同的微生物不断堆积而成。

sentences.en: a tiny community in the Midwest
sentences.cn: 中西部地区一个极小的社区

sentences.en: a tiny little baby
sentences.cn: 丁点大的婴儿

sentences.en: Bad teachers are a tiny minority .
sentences.cn: 差老师只占极少数。

sentences.en: Donkeys outnumber cars in this landscape of tiny stone-walled fields.
sentences.cn: 在这片以石墙隔出巴掌大的农田的乡村，驴子比汽车还多。

sentences.en: From her tiny waist a crinolined skirt cascaded in three deep tiers.
sentences.cn: 裙架撑起的三层大裥裙从她的纤腰上款款垂下。

sentences.en: Genes are those tiny bits of biological information swapped in sexual reproduction.
sentences.cn: 基因是在有性繁殖中交换的微小生物信息。

sentences.en: He directed the tiny beam of light at the roof.
sentences.cn: 他把那一小束光对准了屋顶。

sentences.en: He felt tiny bits of grit and sand peppering his knees.
sentences.cn: 他感到细小的沙砾不断打在膝盖上。

sentences.en: Her wardrobe consists primarily of huge cashmere sweaters and tiny Italian sandals.
sentences.cn: 她的衣物主要是宽大的开司米毛衣和小巧的意大利凉鞋。

sentences.en: She always felt a tiny bit sad.
sentences.cn: 她总是感到一丝悲伤。

sentences.en: She had made Helen a dress which showed off her tiny waist.
sentences.cn: 她给海伦做了件很显她纤细腰身的连衣裙。

sentences.en: The centre of the city is full of tiny intersecting alley-ways.
sentences.cn: 市中心到处是纵横交错的小巷道。

sentences.en: The earrings were tiny.
sentences.cn: 耳环很小。

sentences.en: The goldfish swam round and round in their tiny bowls.
sentences.cn: 金鱼在小小的鱼缸里一圈圈地游来游去。

sentences.en: The lungs are in fact constructed of thousands of tiny tubes.
sentences.cn: 肺实际上由上千条细微的气管构成。

sentences.en: The Martian atmosphere contains only tiny amounts of water.
sentences.cn: 火星的大气层中只含有极少量的水。

sentences.en: Though she was tiny, she had a very loud voice.
sentences.cn: 她虽然个头小，嗓音却非常洪亮。

sentences.en: tiny pieces of paper
sentences.cn: 碎纸屑片

sentences.en: Tiny secluded beaches can be found off the beaten track.
sentences.cn: 在人迹罕至的地方可以找到一些隐蔽的小海滩。

sentences.en: We were worried that one tiny jolt could worsen her injuries.
sentences.cn: 我们担心稍微颠簸一下就可能会使她的伤势恶化。
